title.rendered: Kerastase 8H Magic Night Serum – Nourish Your Dreams

content.rendered:
Introducing Nutritive 8H Magic Night Serum, the moisturising hair serum that transforms dry hair overnight. Like an intensive night cream, it works while you sleep to repair and nourish, leaving it silky and smooth by morning.

There is nothing like the pure luxury of beauty sleep and women across the world are making their night routine an essential component in their beauty regime. As we know that while we sleep our body goes into a repairing state, making it the perfect time to let powerful, nutrient-rich beauty treatments work wonders.

Over the past few years, the night skin care regime of beauty lovers has greatly expanded (think serums’ creams and overnight masks) and now Kerastase is extending this to our much-loved tresses. The new Nutritive 8H magic Night Serum is the hair care answer to a nighttime skin care ritual, promising to waking with nourished, smooth and shiny hair. Applied in one simple step just before bed, it captures the healing power of sleep, enveloping the hair with vital nutrients.

Kerastase 8H Magic Night Serum gives a nourishing boost to all dry hair types. During the night, hair is prone to reverse the daytime loss by absorbing all of nutrients of you hair care. Applied at night, hair progressively absorbs the nutrients of the nourishing serum to reverse daytime depletion. This milky-gel like cream melts into the hair to be quickly absorbed. The next morning, hair looks nourished and is visibly softer, easier to style, with a lightweight satin finish.

Why We Love Kerastase 8H Magic Night Serum..

  • From the moment you apply 8h Magic Night Serum, it begins to penetrate and moisturize dry hair, soaking in within minutes. There is no residue left behind, no transfer of the product onto your pillow or bed linens. In the morning, the product has completely disappeared into the hair.
  • The evolving fragrance – The serum emits relaxing floral notes for the first 2 hours, then mellows into a soft, soothing effect for the next 6 hours. After 8 hours of rest, the scent becomes an energizing agent, enveloping the senses upon wakeup.
  • After a full night of sleep, the 8h Magic Night Serum has completed its repair cycle and absorbed into the hair. When you wake, your hair is smooth, moisturized, repaired, and ready to style for daytime, no rinsing required.
